content.raw:
Found a problem with the fnr switch visual. It gets reset after the drc vehicle is moved via the mouse.

To reproduce: 

1. Set switch to reverse using joint control widget 

2. Move drc vechicle with mouse 

Observe the swtich visual changes back to forward. Possibly a gazebo visual transparency bug.
content.html:
Found a problem with the fnr switch visual. It gets reset after the drc vehicle is moved via the mouse.

To reproduce:

  1. Set switch to reverse using joint control widget

  2. Move drc vechicle with mouse

Observe the swtich visual changes back to forward. Possibly a gazebo visual transparency bug.
